Nov. 18, 2000 D Reading Contest (Thames Valley Challenge Contest)

Reading Town Hall, Reading, Berkshire, England, UK Bands played the march "Folk Songs from Somerset" from Vaughan Williams's "English Folk Songs Suite" plus an own choice hymn.
